verses.name: Daniel 4:27
verses.text: Wherefore, O king, let my counsel be acceptable unto thee, and break off thy sins by righteousness, and thine iniquities by shewing mercy to the poor; if it may be a lengthening of thy tranquillity.

verses.name: Daniel 4:28
verses.text: All this came upon the king Nebuchadnezzar.

verses.name: Daniel 4:29
verses.text: At the end of twelve months he walked in the palace of the kingdom of Babylon.

verses.name: Daniel 4:30
verses.text: The king spake, and said, Is not this great Babylon, that I have built for the house of the kingdom by the might of my power, and for the honour of my majesty?
